page.title: 11Annual Junior School Camp
page.content: Sometimes Junior school children go on school trips. Ours was a 5 day camping trip to Wales. We gained a lot from the experience of having to look after ourselves in tents in a field. Conditions were very difficult but we managed. It rained heavily each night creating thick mud everywhere. The trip to the toilet became an expedition. We had to change our wet clothes often and found beetles in our sleeping bags. We shared the daily chores, tidying, washing up after breakfast, making sandwiches for lunch and tightening the guy ropes on our tents. Our trips out included a ride on the cable tram to Aberystwyth Camera Obscura, a bout trip to see the guillemots but, most important of all, a walk round the shops to buy presents for our parents and spend all our money.
